name: Fractured Soul
summary: Fractured Soul takes the classic platformers of the 80s and doubles the action! Your unique ability to shift between two parallel dimensions allows you to weave through enemy fire, catch opponents by surprise, and leap over impossibly wide gaps by using platforms in both realities.
storyline: You are the Entity, one who is able to shift between realities at will. Your mission is to defend the Typhon Cluster, lifeblood of all existence, from a swarm of invading hostiles. With danger on all sides, it is only your unique power that can give you a fighting chance.

esrb.synopsis: This is an action platformer in which players control a hero who must escape from a space station and confront his mysterious past. Players use a laser blaster to shoot pellet-like bursts at roaming aliens, robots, and spaceships. Creatures sometimes groan then dissolve when hit; when players' character is hit, he cries out and his health meter gets depleted. The game also depicts frenetic spaceship battles, which are accompanied by laser fire and brief explosions.

pegi.synopsis:
The content of this game is suitable for persons aged 12 years and over only.
It contains: Violence in a sporting context
